file_content.text: Production on the Blood Boiler is moving forward. I cannot wait.
Blood Boiler tested? Live fire successful?
Finally. Stringent tests are finished, the Blood Boiler is complete!
I have you to thank, my lord. Soon our enemies will have a new reason to fear us.
Thank you, agent. I will note your help in my report to the Empire.
I am proud you tested it first, hunter. Soon we will redefine pain for our enemies.
You made this possible. Thank you. Soon, our enemies will beg to surrender.
Use the Blood Boiler, have fun. I await the test results.
What are you working on?
Project is nearly complete, my lord. You will enjoy.
Agent. You come to check on my progress? It is almost complete.
You will like my work, hunter. It fits your tastes.
My project goes well. Almost ready.
The Blood Boiler introduces engineered poison into veins. Blood turns to acid. Every heartbeat, agony. Messy, messy.
If this weapon works as you promise, you have served the Empire well.
Good work, doctor.
Thank you, my lord. Good to hear.
I can't wait to see our enemies writhe from its effects.
Lovely.
You are in luck, my lord.
If your weapon works, it could demoralize an entire enemy force.
That could prove useful.
Yes. We will use it against House Organa soon.
I'd hate to be on the wrong end of your Blood Boiler, doc.
I'm glad you're on our side.
I knew you would appreciate it, hunter.
What's the point of a weapon that doesn't kill?
But it's non-lethal?
It breaks the enemy, like House Organa. They do anything to avoid the pain. Even join the Empire.
Sounds inhumane.
Exactly the point. It will break the Empire's enemies. House Organa will not stomach the pain for long.
The Blood Boiler is almost ready for mass production. Only requires a live fire run, first. You do the honors?
This weapon better impress.
I promise, you will enjoy.
Fine. Give me the weapon.
Have some excitement. This moment is historic.
Take the Blood Boiler. Use it on the Killiks, marvel at its effects. Then bring back to me.
Not one bit. [Refuse quest]
You do not know what you're missing.
Please, no distractions. I need test results.
Why tell me this?
